TITLE: COMMANDS THROUGH MESSAGES ARE IN DEPRECATED
DESCRIPTION:
As of Filo v4, message commands are deprecated and will therefore no longer be responded to.

**Now you must use Filo's Slash Commands!**
Try the first command of this type by typing this in the chat: **{{command}}**.

**The command doesn't appear?**
Make sure you have the Slash Commands integration added on your server! **[Click here]({{url2}})** if you don't have it yet.

More information about this change by **[clicking here]({{url}})**.
